questions.question: A DevOps engineer is troubleshooting an issue with an AWS CodeDeploy pipeline that keeps failing during the Deploy stage. Which troubleshooting step should they take first?
options: Check the pipeline configuration in CodeDeploy and AWS CodeBuild.
Disable all pipeline stages except the Deploy stage to isolate the issue.
Review all logs from the Deploy stage for error messages.
Redeploy the application manually using the AWS Command Line Interface (AWS CLI).
correct_answers: Review all logs from the Deploy stage for error messages.
